Hyde Park Ice Pavilion - Worth Visiting

Hyde Park Ice Pavilion was built in 1970 and recently has completed a 9 million dollar renovation. This included all locker rooms, ices surfaces, boards, bleaches, lobby, bar, and lounge.

With two brand new ice pads, J.R. Stoneroom bar and Lounge, Hyde Park Ice Pavilion has become a premiere rink in Western New York.

Come Join All The Fun At Hyde Park Ice Pavilion

Hyde Park is the Proud Home of the Niagara Ice Hawks, Hills Hockey Development, Niagara Falls and Grand Island hockey. In additions we have skaters of all different ages from our learn to skate programs all the way to our “senior” leagues. We also offer public skating Fridays through Sundays!

With space for up to 200 people we can hold many different events including birthday parties, graduation, and family reunions. Contact us at 716-285-0715 today.

Rent all the ice you would like, we offer a ton of ice rental options for pick up hockey and parties

Rental Directions

After clicking the button below you will be looking at the schedule for the rink. To adjust your view, hover your mouse over the words "Schedule" on the top left of the page. You can view the schedule by day, week or month. To change to a specific day, click on the calendar on the top left of the page.

Any time that is gray is available. Any time that is orange is booked. Any time that is Blue has recently become available. Both Rink 1 and Rink 2 are shown.

You can also book JR's Stoneroom here, the schedule is also shown.

If you have any questions or concerns, or need help with booking a time please give Mike Carella a call at 716-316-1526

WE ALSO OFFER INDIVIDUAL RATES FOR TRAINING PURPOSES. MORNING AND DAYTIME RENTALS ALSO AVAILABLE AT REDUCED RATE.
